extensionDescription.message: Web copilot for all, free & open-source!

and_pin_Webpilot_to_your_nav_bar.message: and pin Webpilot to your nav bar

Ask_a_question_about_this_webpage.message: Ask a question about this webpage

Chrome_s_Settings__History__and_Web_Stor.message: Chrome's Settings, History, and Web Store pages

Display_Webpilot_icon_when_text_is_selec.message: Display Webpilot icon when text is selected

Due_to_Chrome_s_constraints__Webpilot_ca.message: Due to Chrome's constraints, Webpilot cannot be activated on the following webpages:

Explain_it_in_English_using_words_a_midd.message: Explain it in English using words a middle schooler can understand

Find_the_questions_todo_on_the_page__ana.message: Find the questions/todo on the page, analyze them step by step, and provide a complete solution in the end. If a specified starting point is given, use it directly without changing.

Free_usage_for_this_week_has_been_exhaus.message: Free usage for this week has been exhausted (50 times/week). You can input your OpenAI API Key in the settings page for unlimited use, or wait for the quota refresh at 0:00 UTC+0 on Monday.

Generate_a_list_of_10_long_tail_keywords.message: Generate a list of 10 long-tail keywords for SEO, related to this page

Translate_the_content__ensuring_accuracy.message: Translate the content to English, ensuring accuracy, fluency, and preserving the original meaning

Refine_text__review_and_revise_problems_.message: Refine text, review and revise problems in spelling, grammar, punctuation, word usage, and sentence structure

Setup_your_own_API_key__to_enjoy_more.message: Setup your own API key, to enjoy more

Summarize_in_English__concise_and_clear.message: Summarize in English, concise and clear

Webpilot_will_answer_based_on_the_curren.message: Webpilot will answer based on the current page if no text is selected
